Magazine Article | October 20, 2015 The Marriage Of LP And Inventory Visibility To access this content, please Register or Sign In. By Matt Pillar , senior executive editor, Innovative Retail Technologies 
November 2015 Innovative Retail Technologies 
Dual EAS/RFID technology adoption is on the rise, helping retailers protect and maintain their inventory. 
Retailers are adopting dual technology EAS/RFID hard tags at a double-digit growth pace, according to Kim Warne, director of global marketing at Tyco Retail Solutions, and Su Doyle, industry program manager at Checkpoint Systems. Dual technology tags contain AM (acousto-magnetic) EAS and RFID elements, which are applied and encoded at the source to provide AM antitheft protection along with RFID for inventory counting, location, and tracking.
